allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ROUND_OF_32 support for FIFA World Cup 2026 \(48 teams\)

- Added ROUND_OF_32 to MatchType enum and knockout scoring config
- Expanded group support from A-H to A-L \(12 groups\)
- Updated knockout labels to "Till X" format for clarity
- Added World Cup 2026 SQL data file with 48 teams and 104 matches
- Group teams by their group in knockout prediction page

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add PWA support for mobile app experience

- Updated manifest.json with required PWA fields \(scope, orientation, categories\)
- Added PWA icons \(192x192, 512x512, maskable\)
- Added iOS meta tags for web app support
- App can now be installed on home screen on both iOS and Android

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add PWA install prompt banner

- Shows install prompt after 3 seconds on supported browsers
- Remembers dismissal for 24 hours
- Clean banner UI with install button

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
